mapper.sql: id, value, label, type, description, sort, parent_id as "parentId", create_by as "createBy.id", create_date as "createDate", update_by as "updateBy.id", update_date as "updateDate", remarks
mapper.select: SELECT type from pm_sys_dict where del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} group by type
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pm_sys_dict ( value, label, type, description, sort, parent_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{value}, #{label}, #{type}, #{description}, #{sort}, #{parentId}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE pm_sys_dict SET value = #{value}, label = #{label}, type = #{type}, description = #{description}, sort = #{sort}, parent_id = #{parentId}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
